decision_conditions: The works hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this consent.Reason: This is required by Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The original amber leaded glass panels to be retained and fitted to the approved replacement front door shall be stored and preserved appropriately in a secure, weatherproof area following its temporary removal from the existing door frame.  Reason: To safeguard the character and appearance of the Listed Building in accordance with policy CS8 of the Core Strategy, and development management policies DM10 and DM12

Any damage to the building caused by or during the course of the carrying out of the work permitted shall be made good within 3 months of the completion of the development, in accordance with a specification agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority. Reason: To safeguard the character and appearance of the Listed Building in accordance with policy CS8 of the Core Strategy, and development management policies DM10 and DM12
description: Replacement of an existing front door
